title: [feature request] Add CUDA 9.2 pytorch wheels
body_html: CUDA 9.2 is now default on Arch Linux, please add CUDA 9.2 pytorch releases to pytorch.org. Using older (9.1) release with 9.2 produces errors for me when I'm trying to compile my own layers from CUDA (like in https://github.com/jwyang/faster-rcnn.pytorch repository)
body_text: CUDA 9.2 is now default on Arch Linux, please add CUDA 9.2 pytorch releases to pytorch.org. Using older (9.1) release with 9.2 produces errors for me when I'm trying to compile my own layers from CUDA (like in https://github.com/jwyang/faster-rcnn.pytorch repository)
